title: 207-Monkey King: Girls Before Swine
itunes:title: 207-Monkey King: Girls Before Swine
description:
We're back in the tale of the Journey to the West, where we'll catch up with the pious monk, Xangzang, the Monkey King, Sun Wukong, and the incognito dragon horse, Yulong as they continue their trek to India. This week, they stop off on what they think is a side-quest - helping an old man whose daughter was kidnapped by a pig monster - but they might get more than they bargained for...and make a new friend.

The creature this week is the Milk Bird, your new source of milk that doesn't care about trivial details like birds not being mammals.

Looking for gifts for the holidays? Look no further than the Myths and Legends store: https://myths.link/store

Or how about ad-free episodes and bonus shows? Check out https://www.mythpodcast.com/membership

--

Sponsor:

Check out http://www.athleticgreens.com/legends to get a free year supply of Vitamin D and 5 free travel packs today!

--

Music:

"Lord Weasel" by Blue Dot Sessions

"Grimmail" by Blue Dot Sessions

"Escaping Forever" by Michael Vignola

"Caprese" by Blue Dot Sessions

"Lamb Drop" by Blue Dot Sessions

"Classical tension" by Neil Cross

Support the show: https://www.mythpodcast.com/membership

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
